title.rendered: Drexel University Undergraduate Application and Deadline

content.rendered:
Drexel University has announced that the online Portal for admission into the 2024 – 2024 academic session is currently open. Prospective students can apply for early decision following this article.

You may want to review the cost of application and the entire bills in the University. The Drexel University Cost is comparably low for all students. But depending on the various cooperative education options, timing of costs such as tuition, fees, and room and boar varies.

Drexel University Undergraduate Application and Deadline

Steps to Apply for Admission in Drexel university

Your application for admission into the Drexel Undergraduate and post Graduate studies is done in the following steps;

Steps to Applying | Drexel university

  1. Review Drexel’s Admission Prerequisites and Application Deadlines
  2. Read the Application Instructions
  3. Complete Your Application
  4. Submit Your Supplemental Materials
  5. Check Your Application Status

You can the Drexel Admission Application form online following the steps below;

  • Open your web browser,
  • Go to https://drexel.edu/admissions/apply/undergrad-instructions
  • Click the Complete Your Application
  • Choose your application method.
  • Fill all necessary forms and upload documents
  • Pay application fees
  • Submit transcript and other relevant documents

Undergraduate Tuition and Fees | Drexel University

The fees structures for all category of students for 2024 – 2024 session is given below

Drexel University Cost

The Drexel University Cost of attendance is given as follows

First-Year Costs

Below are the estimated costs of tuition, fees, and average room and board based on three quarters for the 2024–2024 academic year.

Tuition $56,595
Fees $2,405
Room and Board $16,980

Viewing Your Cost Of Attendance

You can access your Drexel University cost of Attendance following the categories below

  • Newly Admitted Students, can view through the Financial Aid tab of Discover Drexel.
  • Returning Students can view cost of attendance via DrexelOne by following the steps below;

All returning students should follow the steps below to view cost of Attendance.

  • Log in to DrexelOne.
  • Select the “Billing and Financial Aid” tab.
    • In the “Financial Aid Summary” channel, your cost of attendance information will be listed below “Financial Aid Award,” in the section labeled “Estimated Cost of Attendance.
